zapIn(address,address,uint256,address,ad.details: swap and add liquidity to a pool with token-weth

params.deadline: the last time the transaction can be executed
params.minLpQty: min of lp token after swap

zapInEth(address,address,address,uint256.details: swap eth to token and then add liquidity to a pool with token-weth

params.deadline: the last time the transaction can be executed
params.minLpQty: min of lp token after swap
params.tokenOut: another token of the pool - not weth
